languages.text: Корабельные канониры с сомнением относятся к идее засыпать зеленоватое пламя отходами с корабля, но не смеют противиться воле Лорд-капитана. Сброшенный груз рассыпается, едва коснувшись разрядов, и не производит никакого эффекта.

traits.locale_text: Корабельные канониры с сомнением относятся к идее засыпать зеленоватое пламя отходами с корабля, но не смеют противиться воле Лорд-капитана. Сброшенный груз рассыпается, едва коснувшись разрядов, и не производит никакого эффекта.

languages.text: The vessel's cannoneers find the idea of smothering the green flame with the ship's waste rather dubious, but do not dare question the will of the Lord Captain. The dropped cargo dissolves to no effect, barely touching the discharges.
languages.original_text: Корабельные канониры с сомнением относятся к идее засыпать зеленоватое пламя отходами с корабля, но не смеют противиться воле Лорд-капитана. Сброшенный груз рассыпается, едва коснувшись разрядов, и не производит никакого эффекта.

traits.locale_text: The vessel's cannoneers find the idea of smothering the green flame with the ship's waste rather dubious, but do not dare question the will of the Lord Captain. The dropped cargo crumbles to no effect, barely touching the discharges.

The vessel's cannoneers find the idea of smothering the green flame with the ship's waste rather dubious, but do not dare question the will of the Lord Captain. The dropped cargo crumbles to no effect, barely touching the discharges.

The vessel's cannoneers find the idea of smothering the green flame with the ship's waste rather dubious, but do not dare question the will of the Lord Captain. The dropped cargo dissolves to no effect, barely touching the discharges.

The vessel's cannoneers find the idea of smothering the green flame with the ship's waste rather dubious, but do not dare question the will of the Lord Captain. The dropped cargo dissolves to no effect, barely touching the discharges.

The vessel's cannoneers find the idea of smothering the green flame with the ship's waste rather dubious, but do not dare question the will of the Lord Captain. The dropped cargo dissolves to no effect, barely touching the discharges.

languages.text: 尽管舰船上的炮手认为用舰船的废料扑灭绿色火焰的想法相当可疑，但他们并不敢质疑领主舰长的意志。丢下去的废弃物溶解了，却没有产生任何效果，甚至都没有碰到绿色的火花。
languages.original_text: The vessel's cannoneers find the idea of smothering the green flame with the ship's waste rather dubious, but do not dare question the will of the Lord Captain. The dropped cargo dissolves to no effect, barely touching the discharges.

traits.locale_text: 尽管舰船上的炮手认为用舰船的废料扑灭绿色火焰的想法相当可疑，但他们并不敢质疑领主舰长的意志。丢下去的废弃物溶解了，却没有产生任何效果，甚至都没有碰到绿色的火花。

languages.text: この船の砲撃手たちは、緑の炎を船の廃棄物で覆って消すというアイディアにかなり疑問を感じているが、ロード・キャプテンの意志を疑う勇気はない。投下された貨物は、ほとんど放電に触れることなく、何の効果もなく溶解する。
languages.original_text: The vessel's cannoneers find the idea of smothering the green flame with the ship's waste rather dubious, but do not dare question the will of the Lord Captain. The dropped cargo dissolves to no effect, barely touching the discharges.

traits.locale_text: この船の砲撃手たちは、緑の炎を船の廃棄物で覆って消すというアイディアにかなり疑問を感じているが、ロード・キャプテンの意志を疑う勇気はない。投下された貨物は、ほとんど放電に触れることなく、何の効果もなく溶解する。

languages.text: Los cañoneros de la nave creen que la idea de sofocar la llama verde con los desechos de la nave es bastante arriesgada, pero no se atreven a cuestionar la voluntad {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán. La carga arrojada se disuelve sin efecto, apenas tocando las descargas.
languages.original_text: The vessel's cannoneers find the idea of smothering the green flame with the ship's waste rather dubious, but do not dare question the will of the Lord Captain. The dropped cargo dissolves to no effect, barely touching the discharges.

traits.locale_text: Los cañoneros de la nave creen que la idea de sofocar la llama verde con los desechos de la nave es bastante arriesgada, pero no se atreven a cuestionar la voluntad {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán. La carga arrojada se disuelve sin {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}, apenas tocando las descargas.

languages.text: Die Kanoniere begegnen dem Einfall, die grüne Flamme durch den Abfall des Schiffs zu ersticken, mit Skepsis. Sie wagen es aber nicht, den Willen des Lord Captains zu hinterfragen. Die abgeworfene Fracht löst sich auf, ohne dass irgendetwas geschieht. Sie berührt die Entladungen kaum.
languages.original_text: The vessel's cannoneers find the idea of smothering the green flame with the ship's waste rather dubious, but do not dare question the will of the Lord Captain. The dropped cargo dissolves to no effect, barely touching the discharges.

traits.locale_text: Die Kanoniere begegnen dem Einfall, die grüne Flamme durch den Abfall des Schiffs zu ersticken, mit Skepsis. Sie wagen es aber nicht, den Willen des Lord Captains zu hinterfragen. Die abgeworfene Fracht löst sich auf, ohne dass irgendetwas geschieht. Sie berührt die Entladungen kaum.

languages.text: Les canonniers sont dubitatifs à l'idée d'étouffer les flammes vertes avec les eaux usées du vaisseau, mais ils n'osent pas contester les ordres {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. La bombe puante ainsi larguée se désagrège sans produire le moindre effet et c'est à peine si elle touche les décharges électriques.
languages.original_text: The vessel's cannoneers find the idea of smothering the green flame with the ship's waste rather dubious, but do not dare question the will of the Lord Captain. The dropped cargo dissolves to no effect, barely touching the discharges.

traits.locale_text: Les canonniers sont dubitatifs à l'idée d'étouffer les flammes vertes avec les eaux usées du vaisseau, mais ils n'osent pas contester les ordres {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. La bombe puante ainsi larguée se désagrège sans produire le moindre effet et c'est à peine si elle touche les décharges électriques.

languages.text: Topçular, geminin atık suyuyla yeşil yangını söndürebileceklerinden şüphe etse de Lord Kaptan'ın emrine karşı gelmiyor. Gemiden bırakılan su, kıvılcımlara zar zor ulaşıp en ufak bir etki yaratmıyor.
languages.original_text: The vessel's cannoneers find the idea of smothering the green flame with the ship's waste rather dubious, but do not dare question the will of the Lord Captain. The dropped cargo dissolves to no effect, barely touching the discharges.
